page.title: 11Concord Sports Centre Sheff.
page.content: Concord Sports Centre was built 10 years ago and last week we went to have a look round. The guide said that there were more than 20 different sports you could play there. First we saw the table tennis room. Two people were playing. Next we looked at the trampolines and at the men practising weight lifting. We went down some steps and there we were in the lower hall where they do judo, karate and hockey. In the main hall up above we saw people playing short tennis with a plastic racket and a foam rubber ball. Outside you could play golf, football or go orienteering. The swimming pool was empty because it was being repaired, but it will be finished by the 6 weeks holiday. I think we are very lucky to live near Concord Sports Centre.
